published.title: Target and Biomarker Exploration Portal for Drug Discovery research
published.authors: Debjyoti Ray, Muneendra Ojha , Dong Xu, Gyan Srivastava
published.description: A comprehensive knowledge graph-based portal for drug discovery research focusing on biomarker exploration and target identification, integrating data from multiple biomedical databases.

published.title: Deep Q-Snake: An Intelligent Agent Mastering the Snake Game with Deep Reinforcement Learning
published.authors: Debjyoti Ray; Arindam Ghosh; Muneendra Ojha ; Krishna Pratap Singh
published.description: This paper explores the application of Deep Q-Learning to create an intelligent agent capable of mastering the classic Snake game, demonstrating the effectiveness of reinforcement learning in game environments.

published.title: AgentXthics: Multi-Agent Resource Management Simulation
published.venue: UC Berkeley RDI AgentX Hackathon (Research Track), 2025
published.description: An LLM-driven multi-agent simulation exploring ethical decision-making in resource-constrained environments. The system implements inter-agent negotiation and conflict-resolution protocols to balance individual utility against collective sustainability, with real-time monitoring of resource metrics and agent behaviors to extract insights on ethical trade-offs.
